context_of_use: This use case allows an admin to configure and customize system settings and operational parameters.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Control system settings for customization
description: This use case enables admins to configure and customize system settings and operational parameters.
triggering_event: Admin requests to configure system settings.
preconditions: Admin is logged into the system.
Admin has the necessary permissions to configure system settings.
postconditions: System settings are updated according to admin configurations.
assumptions: The admin has the required permissions to access system configuration.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to configure system settings.
main_flow: 1. Admin requests to configure system settings → System displays configuration options.
2. Admin selects desired settings → System updates the settings.
3. Admin confirms the changes → System saves the new settings.
